Verses: 1 adhanpinbu Avan Therbaikkum Leesthiraavukkum Ponaan. Ange Theemoththeyu Ennappatta Oru Seeshan Irundhaan; Avan Thaai Visuvaasamulla Yoodhasthiree, Avan Thagappan Girekkan.
2 avan Leesthiraavilum Ikkoniyaavilumulla Sagodhararaale Narsaatchi Petravanaayirundhaan.

3 avanaip Pavul Thannudane Koottikkondu Pogavendumendru Virumbi, Avanudaiya Thagappan Girekkan Endru Avvidangalilirukkum Yoodhargalellaam Arindhirundhapadiyaal, Avargal Nimiththam Avanukku Viruththasedhanampanninaan.
4 avargal Pattanangaldhorum Pogaiyil, Erusalemilirukkum Apposthalaraalum Moopparaalum Vidhikkappatta Sattangalaik Kaikkollumpadi Avargalukku Oppuviththaargal.
5 adhinaale Sabaigal Visuvaasaththil Sthirappattu, Naalukkunaal Perugina.
6 avargal Pirigiyaa Kalaaththiyaa Naadugalaik Kadandhuponabodhu, Aasiyaavile Vasanaththaich Sollaadhapadikkup Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Thadaipannappattu,
7 meesiyaa Dhesamattum Vandhu, Biththiniyaa Naattukkup Pogap Pirayaththanampanninaargal; Aaviyaanavaro Avargalaip Pogavottaadhirundhaar.
8 appozhudhu Avargal Meesiyaa Pakkamaaip Poi, Thurovaavukku Vandhaargal.

9 ange Raaththiriyile Pavulukku Oru Dharisanam Undaayitru; Adhennavenil, Makkedhoniyaa Dhesaththaanoruvan Vandhunindru: Neer Makkedhoniyaavukku Vandhu Engalukku Udhaviseyya Vendumendru Thannai Vendikkondathaaga Irundhadhu.

10 andhath Dharisanaththai Avan Kandabodhu, Avargalukkuch Suviseshaththai Arivikkumpadi Karththar Engalai Azhaiththaarendru Naangal Nichchayiththukkondu, Udane Makkedhoniyaavukkup Purappattuppogap Pirayaththanampanni,
11 thurovaavil Kappal Eri, Saamoththiraakke Theevukkum, Marunaalile Neyaappoli Pattanaththukkum Neraai Odi,
12 angeyirundhu Makkedhoniyaa Thesaththu Naadugalil Ondrirkuth Thalaimaiyaanadhum Romar Kudiyerinadhumaana Pilippi Pattanaththukku Vandhu, Andhap Pattanaththile Silanaal Thangiyirundhom.
13 oivunaalil Naangal Pattanaththukku Veliye Poi, Aatrinaruge Vazhakkamaai Jebampannugira Idaththil Utkaarndhu, Ange Koodivandha Sthireegalukku Ubadhesiththom.

14 appozhudhu Thiyaththeeraa Ooraalum Raththaambaram Virkiravalum Dhevanai Vanangukiravalumaagiya Leedhiyaal Ennum Perulla Oru Sthiree Kettukkondirundhaal; Pavul Solliyavaigalaik Gavanikkumpadi Karththar Aval Irudhayaththaith Thirandharulinaar.

15 avalum Aval Veettaarum Gnaanasnaanam Petrapinbu, Aval Engalai Nokki: Neengal Ennaik Karththaridaththil Visuvaasamullavalendru Enninaal, En Veettile Vandhu Thangiyirungalendru Engalai Varundhik Kettukkondaal.
16 naangal Jebampannugira Idaththukkup Pogaiyil Kurisolla Evugira Aaviyaikkondirundhu, Kurisollugiradhinaal Than Ejamaangalukku Migundha Aadhaayaththai Undaakkina Oru Pen Engalukku Edhirppattaal.
17 aval Pavulaiyum Engalaiyum Pinthodarndhu Vandhu: Indha Manushar Unnadhamaana Dhevanudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar, Ratchippin Vazhiyai Namakku Arivikkiravargal Endru Saththamittaal.

18 ippadi Aneganaal Seydhukonduvandhaal. Pavul Sinangkondu, Thirumbippaarththu: Nee Ivalai Vittuppurappadumpadi Yesukiristhuvin Naamaththinaale Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiren Endru Andha Aaviyudane Sonnaan; Annerame Adhu Purappattuppoyitru.
19 avaludaiya Ejamaangal Thangal Aadhaayaththu Nambikkai Atruppoyitrendru Kandu, Pavulaiyum Seelaavaiyum Pidiththu, Sandhaiveliyilulla Adhigaarigalidaththil Izhuththukkonduponaargal.
20 avargalai Adhigaarigalidaththil Oppuviththu: Yoodhargalaagiya Indha Manushar Nammudaiya Pattanaththil Kalagampanni,
21 romaraagiya Naam Etrukkollavum Anusarikkavum Thagaadha Muraimaigalaip Podhikkiraargal Endraargal.
22 appozhudhu Janangal Koottankoodi, Avargalukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbinaargal. Adhigaarigal Avargal Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththuppodavum, Avargalai Adikkavum Solli;
23 avargalai Anega Adi Adiththapinbu, Siraichchaalaiyile Vaiththu Avargalaip Baththiramaaik Kaakkumpadi Siraichchaalaikkaaranukkuk Kattalaiyittaargal.
24 avan Ippadippatta Kattalaiyaippetru, Avargalai Utkaavalaraiyile Adaiththu, Avargal Kaalgalaith Thozhumaraththil Maattivaiththaan.
25 naduraaththiriyile Pavulum Seelaavum Jebampanni, Dhevanaith Thudhiththup Paadinaargal; Kaavalil Vaikkappattavargal Adhaik Kettukkondirundhaargal.
26 sadidhiyile Siraichchaalaiyin Asthibaarangal Asaiyumpadiyaaga Boomi Migavum Adhirndhadhu; Udane Kadhavugalellaam Thiravundadhu; Ellaarudaiya Kattugalum Kazhandrupoyitru.

27 siraichchaalaikkaaran Niththiraithelindhu, Siraichchaalaiyin Kadhavugal Thirandhirukkiradhaik Kandu, Kattundavargal Odipponaargalendru Enni, Pattayaththai Uruvith Thannaik Kolaiseydhu Kollapponaan.
28 pavul Migundha Saththamittu; Nee Unakkuk Kedudhi Ondrunj Seydhukollaadhe; Naangal Ellaarum Ingedhaan Irukkirom Endraan.
29 appozhudhu Avan Theebangalaik Konduvarachsolli, Ulle Odi, Nadunadungi, Pavulukkum Seelaavukkum Munbaaga Vizhundhu,
30 avargalai Veliye Azhaiththuvandhu: Aandavanmaare, Ratchikkappaduvadharku Naan Enna Seyyavendum Endraan.
31 adharku Avargal: Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvai Visuvaasi, Appozhudhu Neeyum Un Veettaarum Ratchikkappaduveergal Endru Solli,
32 avanukkum Avan Veettilirundha Yaavarukkum Karththarudaiya Vasanaththaip Podhiththaargal.
33 melum Raaththiriyil Anneraththiledhaane Avan Avargalai Azhaiththukkondupoi, Avargaludaiya Kaayangalaik Kazhuvinaan. Avanum Avanudaiyavargal Anaivarum Udane Gnaanasnaanam Petraargal.
34 pinbu Avan Avargalaith Than Veettirkuk Koottikkondupoi, Avargalukku Pojanankoduththu, Than Veettaar Anaivarodunkooda Dhevanidaththil Visuvaasamullavanaagi Manamagizhchchiyaayirundhaan.
35 pozhudhu Vidindhapinbu: Andha Manusharai Vittuvidungal Endru Solla Adhigaarigal Sevakargalai Anuppinaargal.

36 siraichchaalaikkaaran Pavulukku Indha Vaarththaigalai Ariviththu: Ungalai Vidudhalaiyaakkumpadikku Adhigaarigal Kattalai Anuppinaargal; Aagaiyaal Neengal Ippozhudhu Purappattuch Samaadhaanaththudane Pongal Endraan.

37 adharkup Pavul: Romaraagiya Engalai Avargal Niyaayam Visaariyaamal, Veliyarangamaai Adiththu, Siraichchaalaiyile Pottaargal; Ippozhudhu Ragasiyamaai Engalai Vidudhalaiyaakkugiraargalo? Appadiyalla, Avargale Vandhu, Engalai Veliye Azhaiththu Anuppividattum Endraan.
38 sevagar Indha Vaarththaigalai Adhigaarigalukku Ariviththaargal. Romaraayirukkiraargalendru Avargal Kettapozhudhu Bayandhuvandhu,
39 avargaludane Dhayavaaip Pesi, Avargalai Veliye Azhaiththukkondupoi, Pattanaththai Vittup Purappattuppogumpadi Kettukkondaargal,
40 andhappadi Avargal Siraichchaalaiyilirundhu Purappattu Leedhiyaalidaththirkuppoi, Sagodhararaik Kandu, Avargalukku Aarudhal Sollip Poivittaargal.
